subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Miguel Olivo scored on a passed ball to cap a four-run rally in the ninth inning against Tim Hudson and Bob Wickman, and the host Florida Marlins defeated the Atlanta Braves, 4-3, last night.
snippet: Miguel Olivo scored on a passed ball to cap a four-run rally in the ninth inning against Tim Hudson and Bob Wickman, and the host Florida Marlins defeated the Atlanta Braves, 4-3, last night.
